actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Slam attacks or one Slam attack and uses Capture.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+ 3) bludgeoning damage and 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Capture
actions.desc: Envelopes one up to Med creature in its space. Target: DC 13 Dex save or restrained inside wind witch. Restrained target can't be hit by wind witch's Slam but takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage if it takes action that requires movement (ex: attack or cast somatic spell). When it moves captured creature moves with it. Can have only one creature captured at a time. Creature within 5 ft. of wind witch can use action to pull restrained creature out via DC 13 Str check; creature trying: 5 (2d4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Cursed Plant
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces it to 0 hp becomes inanimate tumbleweed and travels via wind. Regains 5 hp every hr regaining consciousness after the first. This doesn't function if it took fire on same round it was reduced to 0 hp or if its body was destroyed.

special_abilities.name: Flammable
special_abilities.desc: When it takes fire damage catches fire taking 3 (1d6) fire at start of each of its turns. Burns until it takes cold or is immersed in water. Creature that touches wind witch or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it while it is burning takes 3 (1d6) fire. While burning deals extra 3 (1d6) fire on each melee attack and deals 7 (2d6) fire to a captured creature at start of its turn.

special_abilities.name: Tumbleweed Form
special_abilities.desc: Can enter hostile creature's space and stop there.
